matchup: Oklahoma City Thunder @ San Antonio Spurs
reasoning: OKC is catastrophically depleted - missing SGA, Holmgren, Williams, Hartenstein, Dort, Caruso, and Mitchell. This is a G-League roster on B2B after losing by 10 to this same Spurs team yesterday. Wembanyama healthy at home is a massive mismatch. Our injury_edge bets are 2-0.

Jokic OUT is catastrophic for Denver - losing 27.8 PPG, 10 APG and their entire offensive identity. Combined with Gordon/Watson/Johnson out, Nuggets fielding skeleton crew. Knicks 20-6 at home, 8-game win streak, 4-1 H2H with +13.8 avg margin.

Celtics decimated - missing Tatum (out), Brown (doubtful), Hauser, Simons (traded), Boucher. Houston 17-4 at home with 4th-ranked defense facing what amounts to a developmental squad. Clear personnel mismatch.
